title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Revolutionize media production: Field-ready cloud solutions (AMZ307)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 革新媒体制作：现场就绪的云解决方案 (AMZ307)
abstract: Get a behind-the-scenes peek at how Amazon MGM Studios leverages AWS to optimize film and TV production workflows, reduce costs, and even lower their carbon footprint. Discover how the studio modernizes legacy workflows across the content lifecycle, from live cloud production with 40+ cameras to an innovative "Media to Cloud from Anywhere" solution using a modified electric Rivian vehicle, solar-powered trailer, and mobile internet to upload camera files directly to Amazon S3. Learn practical patterns for reinventing legacy workflows with AWS. Perfect for media professionals, technical leaders, and anyone interested in future media workflows. Register today!
abstract_cn: 深入了解亚马逊米高梅工作室如何利用AWS优化影视制作工作流程、降低成本，甚至减少碳足迹。探索工作室如何在整个内容生命周期中实现传统工作流程的现代化，从使用40多台摄像机的实时云制作，到创新的"随时随地媒体上云"解决方案——使用改装的电动Rivian车辆、太阳能拖车和移动互联网将摄像机文件直接上传到Amazon S3。学习使用AWS重塑传统工作流程的实用模式。非常适合媒体专业人士、技术领导者以及任何对未来媒体工作流程感兴趣的人。立即注册！
